title: A Barrel of Laughs, A Scattering of Slaves (with Michelle Buteau)
itunes:title: A Barrel of Laughs, A Scattering of Slaves (with Michelle Buteau)
description:
Do Black people scatter when they laugh because it’s what slaves would do to avoid causing commotion? Langston and his guest Michelle Buteau (Welcome to Buteaupia and The Circle on Netflix) track down the truth behind this hilarious conspiracy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
